meanings.definition: A Mexican dish consisting of a fried tortilla topped with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the crunchy tostadas with beans and cheese.
meanings.sent2: She ordered tostadas with salsa and avocado for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The tostadas were so loaded with toppings, they looked like mini pizzas!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in topping the tostadas was like an artist painting on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the tostadas cooking made everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: Fried or toasted tortillas used as a base for various dishes.
meanings.sent1: The tostadas served as a perfect base for the taco salad.
meanings.sent2: We used tostadas to make delicious nachos at the party.
meanings.sent3: He stacked the tostadas like building blocks before adding the toppings.
meanings.sent4: The tostadas were like sturdy plates holding the flavorful toppings.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the tostadas added a delightful texture to the dish.
